marytts.tools.voiceimport
Class DatabaseLayout

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.voiceimport.DatabaseLayout

public class DatabaseLayout
extends java.lang.Object

The DatabaseLayout class registers the base directory of a voice database, as well as the various subdirectories where the various voice database components should be stored or read from.

Author:
Anna Hunecke

Method Detail

getComponent

public VoiceImportComponent getComponent(java.lang.String componentName)
Obtain a voice import component by its name. This can be used to run invidivual functions of a given voice import component from another component. Handle with care -- only use this if you know what you are doing!

Parameters:
componentName -
Returns:
the named voice import component, or null if there is no such component.

getProperty

public java.lang.String getProperty(java.lang.String propertyName)
Get the value of a property from the voice building DatabaseLayout, or from a VoiceImportComponent.

Parameters:
propertyName - (e.g. "db.MARYBASE" or "VoicePackager.voiceType")
Returns:
the property value
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if propertyName cannot be resolved

public java.lang.String[][] getAllPropsForDisplay()
